item.title: Título de la publicación
item.description: Introducción Las ecuaciones. \[\begin{align*} y_i &\sim N(\mu_i, \sigma^2) \\ \mu_i &= 59 + 1 x_i \\ \sigma &= 1 \\ x &\sim Uniforme[1, 9] \end{align*}\] Sección 1 summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.
